manuscriptTitle: Predicting the risk of chemotherapy toxicity in older patients: The Chemotherapy Risk Assessment Scale for High‐Age Patients (CRASH) score
feederJournal: CA: A Cancer Journal for Clinicians

results.description: Published eight times per year by the Asian Pacific Society of Nephrology, this journal has a special emphasis on the needs of clinical nephrologists and those in developing countries. The journal publishes reviews and papers of international interest describing original research concerned with clinical and experimental aspects of nephrology.

A leading international clinical pharmacology journal published by the British Pharmacological Society. It bridges the gap between the medical profession, clinical research and the pharmaceutical industry by addressing all aspects of drug action in humans: invited review articles, original papers and correspondence.

An open access journal publishing clinical and translational research on the detection, diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of skin malignanciesSo you don't have to spend time reformatting your article, the journal team will do this for you as part of the transfer: https://bit.ly/2RULcYG. If accepted, an Article Processing Charge (APC) will apply. To find out more about APCs and our transparent waiver policy, visit: https://bit.ly/2TpD9TS
